Text: Yeah I'm french, thanks to you I can watch the game nba in HD easily
thank you for the nba games, great job. one question why do you download game 1 again with game 2? I've been downloading the 720p fs 23? because you were doing 1 game at a time.

Btw the 60FPS games goes very fast for me even with the small number of seeders prior to the simple version.!1.1MB now ETA only 50 minutes.And u guys if u only want to download game 2 do this.Go to your bit torrent program start downloading and when u see in the down section the 2 games showing stop downloading.Go to the down section right click game 1 and click to "Dont download".With that way u will only download the second game.Give it a try is very easy..
